Author: CrisF#3405
Content:
.02
```Goal:    TOTAL NETWORK BENEFIT (security, performance, improvement)

An example (of not one or the other):

numbers and catagories are an EXAMPLE to illustrate the concept.  adjust to reach goals and simplify as much as possible while still reaching goal.



LAB        # LABS-KMD notarizations        top 4

RECVMASK    time in                    top 4

# chains notarized, then # total notarizations        top 3

vote (poll?)    kmdlabs contributions            top 3

distribution    closest to av ping + a little        top 1
 
-------------------------------------------------------------

remaining     race (trial by fire)            top 5```

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: formula was in pad, what's the link again?

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: basically not rewarding fastest ping, but those closest to the mean within a standard deviation

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: distance from ping is far from exact, but closest to average hops/routes path time does imply some dispersion

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: maybe a modifier for ntx * (1/std. dev. from mean)

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: maybe something to normalise the ping range too

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Going to try and work out a way of preventing a notarisation from reentering the mempool.... if it was flagged as invalid... Its not a great solution.... But at least it stops the miner who mined it trying to mine it again.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: This should prevent the chani stopping if notaries create invalid notarisation...

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Think I have a better solution... Worked it out when talkign to withAlrightt earlier...

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Making it so that the amount the ntoaries are paid, increases or decreases if the notarisation is over or above freq.5

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: This makes it so that notaries cannot just notarise at freq = 1 and get paid more than they are allowed.... Also This makes the suppky they are paid linear... It not longer vaireis by the amount of sucessful notarisations

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: I managed to get validation, to only look at notarisations that are in position 1, so miners who mine notarisations in the wrong order (by changing the daemon) just make that notarisation invalid... I dont think this is ahuge poroblem, because miners could already not mine notarisations....

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: This removes the entire problem of having a notarisation that is invlid invalidate a block.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: As it no longer matters if the notarisation is valid or invalid... becasue notaries cannot notarise mroe than freq = 5.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: There is not reason for them to make invalid ntoarisations to get more money... becasus they cant
